name: Authentication
description: Issues related to the Authentication framework like the Sling Authenticator or any of the Sling Authentication Handler implementations

name: Best practices
description: Things that we want to improve in our code over time, recommended ways to do things etc.

name: CI
description: Issues related to managing the Sling builds on various CI systems such as Jenkins, Buildbot, Travis, etc

name: Commons
description: All issues for modules in commons which don't have an own category and general commons issues.

name: Documentation
description: All issues related to documentation, the web site and the wiki.

name: Extensions
description: All modules placed in the extensions folder and not covered by any other component

name: General
description: All issues that have to do with Sling in general

name: Installer
description: Provisioning and Installation Infrastructure - OOTB Support for bundles, configurations from file systems and JCR repository

name: JCR
description: JCR Repository Integration: JCR API, Jackrabbit server and client, JCR ClassLoader, Object Content Mapping and WebDAV.  Please use Component "JCR Resource" for the ResourceResolver implementation issues.

name: Karaf
description: Sling's Karaf Features and Distribution (and Integration Tests)

name: Maven Plugins and Archetypes
description: Maven Plugins and Archetypes for Sling

name: ResourceResolver
description: Implementation of the Resource Resolver and its Factory

name: Scripting
description: ScriptResolver implementation and additional helper API. This component should also be used for script language bindings other than JSP.

name: Service User Mapper
description: The Service User Mapper to map service names to names for repository access.

name: Servlets
description: Issues regarding Servlet Resolution and default servlets (GET, POST, etc.)

name: Site
description: Issues realated to the Sling Web Site
